metadata.title: CVE-2020-25720 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Create Child permission should not allow full write to all attributes

notes.note: mdeslaur> Patches for this CVE have been commited to Samba master, to be consistent with the changes Microsoft have introduced, but the stable releases have not been patched. See comment #2 in upstream bug. Marking this as deferred until we get more information about this issue.

criterions.comment: samba package in kinetic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
